title: Three Peaks Chalet
description: Three Peaks Chalet is a comprehensive interior design and project management commission in Crans-Montana, Switzerland. PEARLMAN Designs is transforming this alpine property with bespoke joinery, curated furnishings, and a design scheme that celebrates the surrounding mountain landscape. Every detail — from custom millwork to the art programme — was selected to frame the panoramic views of the Valais Alps.

title: Les Pontets
description: Les Pontets is a refined apartment renovation in Crans-Montana where understated luxury meets alpine charm. PEARLMAN Designs delivered a complete interior architecture and design scheme, introducing clean lines, natural materials, and a muted palette to create a sanctuary above the valley. The result is a home that feels both contemporary and rooted in its mountain setting.

title: NBAM Residence
description: The NBAM Residence is a complete turnkey interior design project in Haute-Nendaz, delivered move-in ready by PEARLMAN Designs. From architectural coordination through to FF&E procurement and final styling, every element was considered to create a warm, contemporary mountain retreat. The project showcases our ability to manage every phase of a residential transformation.

title: Chalet La Licorne
description: Chalet La Licorne is an iconic alpine property reimagined by PEARLMAN Designs with a bold yet sensitive approach. Heritage features were preserved and celebrated while introducing contemporary comfort, bespoke furniture, and a curated material palette throughout. The project management encompassed coordination of specialist trades across multiple phases of renovation.
